answers.answer: I'm due April 14 with my first and I too feel like he may come a little earlyFeet and ankles are now swelling tooI was sick a few weeks ago but luckily got over it. Heartburn has gotten worse which I didn't think could be possible and I am very uncomfortable. Ready to be done lol

I am due the 17th, but am scheduled for a c-section on the 14th. I am not sure I can make it that long either.  This is my 2nd child. I am not swelling yet, but I only did a few times with my first, which was August and I live in FL. I have so many more aches and pains this time.  My first baby never dropped, because she was breech. This time my baby dropped about 2 weeks ago, which had caused a lot of pelvic pain.

I am 35 weeks.  Due april 17. With my 1sy kid  i was induced do to preeclampsiaWill see how this  one goes. The  only  i dont like as far as now is waking up because  i cannot  breath and i get anxiety.  Don't mind  the  pee runs at night.

question: Hey ladies. Im due April 16th with baby #2. Recently ive had a feeling like im going to have this baby early. I feel like Im not even pregnant anymore. My baby boy moves fine all day. My back is sore all the time. My feet recently started swelling. With my last pregnancy my feet didnt swell untill 2 weeks before birth. Ive also started to become super sick. Anyone else?
title: 35+1weeks. Anyone else?
